name: Robot Dog looking for Toy Wrenches
name_original: Robot Dog looking for Toy Wrenches
description:
Mini Jam 63 (theme "Future" and limitation "must use specified palette"): all the colours are indeed from the specified palette, and the 'future' part is in the dog robot.

This is a small platformer game in which the object is to collect as many dog toys (the wrenches/spanners) as possible in each level. It's also relatively non-violent, as the robot dog re-spawns immediately after hitting a trap and there are no enemies.

My first functional platformer and my first solo game jam attempt.
